text: Jonathan Taylor Thomas (born Jonathan Taylor Weiss; September 8, 1981 in Bethlehem, Pennsylvania) is a television, film and voice actor. His most notable acting projects are the ABC sitcom Home Improvement and as the voice of young Simba in The Lion King. ==References== Category:Actors from Bethlehem, Pennsylvania Category:American television actors Category:1981 births Category:Living people
title: Jonathan Taylor Thomas
